Text:
While you are trying to upload movies, how about you make a better try of creating proper torrent posting titles for the movies that you upload?

Writing titles in all lower case, without indicating the release year of the film, is rather sloppy.
A better posting title for this torrent would be: "The Punisher (1989)"
And the IMDb code for the torrent posting  would be "tt0098141", since it is this movie:  http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0098141/
